fmiModelDescription.description: An dynamics FMU model for the hull of the ReVolt vessel, It takes inputs from thrusters and enviroment like wind, water currents and waves, and merges it to produce position of the hull at that exact moment
fmiModelDescription.author: Martynas Smilingis

ScalarVariable.name: InputThrusterBowForce
ScalarVariable.description: Force thruster applies to the hull of the ship

ScalarVariable.name: InputThrusterBowAngle
ScalarVariable.description: Angle of thruster forces effecting the hull of the ship

ScalarVariable.name: InputThrusterPortForce
ScalarVariable.description: Force thruster applies to the hull of the ship

ScalarVariable.name: InputThrusterPortAngle
ScalarVariable.description: Angle of thruster forces effecting the hull of the ship

ScalarVariable.name: InputThrusterStarboardForce
ScalarVariable.description: Force thruster applies to the hull of the ship

ScalarVariable.name: InputThrusterStarboardAngle
ScalarVariable.description: Angle of thruster forces effecting the hull of the ship

ScalarVariable.name: InputWindSpeed
ScalarVariable.description: Speed of the wind effecting the hull of the ship

ScalarVariable.name: InputWindAngle
ScalarVariable.description: Angle of the wind effecting the hull of the ship

ScalarVariable.name: InputWaterCurrentSpeed
ScalarVariable.description: Speed of the water current effecting the hull of the ship

ScalarVariable.name: InputWaterCurrentAngle
ScalarVariable.description: Angle of the water current effecting the hull of the ship

ScalarVariable.name: InputWaveHeight[0]
ScalarVariable.description: Front Water Height point of the ship and its distance relative to the wave bellow/above this point

ScalarVariable.name: InputWaveHeight[1]
ScalarVariable.description: Left Water Height of the ship and its distance relative to the wave bellow/above this point

ScalarVariable.name: InputWaveHeight[2]
ScalarVariable.description: Center Water Height point of the ship and its distance relative to the wave bellow/above this point

ScalarVariable.name: InputWaveHeight[3]
ScalarVariable.description: Right Water Height point of the ship and its distance relative to the wave bellow/above this point

ScalarVariable.name: InputWaveHeight[4]
ScalarVariable.description: Back Water Height point of the ship and its distance relative to the wave bellow/above this point

ScalarVariable.name: ParameterHullMass
ScalarVariable.description: [kg] Total mass of the hull in kg

ScalarVariable.name: ParameterHullLength
ScalarVariable.description: [cm] Lenght of the Hull

ScalarVariable.name: ParameterHullWidth
ScalarVariable.description: [cm] Width of the Hull

ScalarVariable.name: ParameterHullHeight
ScalarVariable.description: [cm] Height of the Hull

ScalarVariable.name: ParameterThrusterBowPositionX
ScalarVariable.description: [cm] The X-axis position of the Thruster located at the fron (ie Bow) of the ship hull relative to the center of the ships hull

ScalarVariable.name: ParameterThrusterPortPositionX
ScalarVariable.description: [cm] The X-axis position of the Thruster located at the back Port side of the ship hull relative to the center of the ships hull. Negative values as back of the ship is the negative X-axis

ScalarVariable.name: ParameterThrusterPortPositionY
ScalarVariable.description: [cm] The Y-axis position of the Thruster located at the back Port side of the ship hull relative to the center of the ships hull. Negative values as Port is at the negative side of the Y-axis

ScalarVariable.name: ParameterThrusterStarboardPositionX
ScalarVariable.description: [cm] The X-axis position of the Thruster located at the back Starboard side of the ship hull relative to the center of the ships hull. Negative values as back of the ship is the negative X-axis

ScalarVariable.name: ParameterThrusterStarboardPositionY
ScalarVariable.description: [cm] The Y-axis position of the Thruster located at the back Starboard side of the ship hull relative to the center of the ships hull

ScalarVariable.name: OutputHullPosition[0]
ScalarVariable.description: X-axis linear position of the hull

ScalarVariable.name: OutputHullPosition[1]
ScalarVariable.description: Y-axis linear position of the hull

ScalarVariable.name: OutputHullPosition[2]
ScalarVariable.description: Z-axis linear position of the hull

ScalarVariable.name: OutputHullPosition[3]
ScalarVariable.description: Roll angular position of the hull

ScalarVariable.name: OutputHullPosition[4]
ScalarVariable.description: Pitch angular position of the hull

ScalarVariable.name: OutputHullPosition[5]
ScalarVariable.description: Yaw angular position of the hull

ScalarVariable.name: OutputHullVelocity[0]
ScalarVariable.description: X-axis linear velocity of the hull

ScalarVariable.name: OutputHullVelocity[1]
ScalarVariable.description: Y-axis linear velocity of the hull

ScalarVariable.name: OutputHullVelocity[2]
ScalarVariable.description: Z-axis linear velocity of the hull

ScalarVariable.name: OutputHullVelocity[3]
ScalarVariable.description: Roll angular velocity of the hull

ScalarVariable.name: OutputHullVelocity[4]
ScalarVariable.description: Pitch angular velocity of the hull

ScalarVariable.name: OutputHullVelocity[5]
ScalarVariable.description: Yaw angular velocity of the hull
